channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Judge dismisses criminal case against TikTok streamer held in immigration detention
item.description: A federal judge has dismissed a criminal case against a popular Los Angeles TikTok streamer who is currently being held in immigration detention

item.title: Colorado hires New Mexico's Fernando Lovo to succeed Rick George as athletic director
item.description: Colorado has hired Fernando Lovo as its athletic director, succeeding Rick George

item.title: Officials suspect bird flu after 12 swans die at Orlando's Lake Eola
item.description: A dozen iconic swans at Lake Eola in downtown Orlando have died recently from an unknown cause

item.title: Judge orders release of transcript from closed hearing for man accused of killing Charlie Kirk
item.description: A Utah judge has ordered the release of a transcript from a closed-door hearing in October over whether the man charged with killing Charlie Kirk must...

item.title: World shares are mostly lower in quiet holiday trading as China stages war drills near Taiwan
item.description: Shares in Europe and Asia are mostly lower in thin holiday trading as China stages military exercises near the island of Taiwan
